summary: This is the Metropolitan Correctional Center's daily lieutenant's log for July 7, 2019, documenting routine prison operations, counts, and security checks. The log shows inmate Jeffrey Epstein (Reg #76318-054) was present and was moved within the facility at 7:20 PM. The document is significant as it records Epstein's status and location on the day before his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as inmate #76318-054. The log records his movement within the facility (removed EN to ZA) at 7:20 PM on July 7, 2019.

persons.name: Lt.
persons.context: Multiple unnamed lieutenants who assumed duties for the Morning Watch, Day Watch, and Evening Watch shifts, conducting routine prison operations and logging events.

events.title: Epstein moved within MCC
events.description: At 7:20 PM, inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) was recorded as being 'removed EN to ZA' within the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Routine prison operations and counts
events.description: Standard daily operations at MCC including multiple institutional counts, body alarm tests, equipment checks, and a trash run. An inmate was at a local hospital under USMS guard.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
Local Hosp (mentioned as location of an inmate with USMS guards)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein (Inmate #76318-054) was recorded as present in the Metropolitan Correctional Center on July 7, 2019.
At 7:20 PM on July 7, 2019, Epstein was moved within the facility (noted as 'removed EN to ZA').
The log shows routine prison operations including multiple inmate counts, security checks, and equipment tests.
One inmate was noted as being at a local hospital under US Marshals Service (USMS) guard supervision.
This document provides a timestamped record of Epstein's location and status the day before his death on July 10, 2019.
